text: Kashillatheyum Jeevikkam is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Jose Puthussery, starring Jagathy Sreekumar and Kalpana in the lead role. ==Cast== * Jagathy Sreekumar * Ajith * Kalpana * Pradeep * Rahul Rajwi * Kalabhavan Shajohn * Machan Varghese * Mamukkoya * Manuraj * NF Varghese * Priyanka * Rassia * Salim Kumar * Saritha Balakrishnan * TS Raju ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Kashillatheyum Jeevikkam
